title: Acceleration-displacement of cart with constant a

content.question: A <math alttext="1.5 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math> cart starts from rest and then accelerates at a constant rate of <math alttext="2 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> to the right for <math alttext="5 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>. The displacement of the cart over this time interval is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
